title: Manama
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Manama, from a wide variety of genres like Adult Contemporary, Bollywood, Country, Islamic and Religious.  Enjoy stations such as Bahrain FM, The Voice of Ummah, Radio Bahrain, 961Oldies Online Radio, Discover Islam TV and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: Bahrain FM provides Bahrain World News from the most comprehensive global news network on the internet. News and analysis on Bahrain and international current events,
radio_info.rest: media, audio, concert, music and more. Searchable news in 44 languages from WorldNews Network

Also, this station plays recorded programs such as: classical music, general interest features, Islamic, historical, recipes, book club, comedy, drama, in-concert as well as live English commentary on major sporting events.
